input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video, I'm going to show you how to install Mail in a Box on a Digital Ocean Droplet. You can install your mail server in your homelab on a freshly installed Ubuntu server, you can create as a virtual machine in Proxmox. The reason I choose Digital Ocean is because my internet provider blocks the outgoing SMTP port, 25. I need to purchase a business account to be able to send e-mails otherwise. Let's go!
